title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2523 - Notices And Records
content:

State Regulations
§ 2523.1 - Notice of initial legal regulated rent
§ 2523.2 - Certification of services
§ 2523.3 - Failure to file a certification of services
§ 2523.4 - Failure to maintain services
§ 2523.5 - Notice for renewal of lease and renewal procedure
§ 2523.6 - Notices of appearance by attorney or other authorized representative
§ 2523.7 - Records and recordkeeping
§ 2523.8 - Notice of change of ownership or address

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. S, ch. VIII, subch. B, pt. 2523

Statutory authority: N.Y.C. Administrative Code, §§ 26-511[b], 26-518 [a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
